_header: Of all thing it is the best
_description: Love Jesus over all things — three lines

Lincoln91.Transcription:
Of all thynge it is the bestIhesu in herte fast to festAnd lufe
                    hym ower all thynge
Lincoln91.Note:
Follows ‘Explicit Bonauenture de misterijs Passionis ihesu
                        cristi‘ (f. 189)
Lincoln91.Facsimiles:
Brewer,  Derek Stanley,  and  A. E. B. Owen.  
             “Introduction.” 
             The Thornton Manuscript (Lincoln Cathedral MS. 91).
         London: Scolar Press, 1975.
